# What happens next?

* **Until the weekend:** Based on your interests, we compile a list of relevant readings. If you haven't done so, fill out the [nuudel](https://nuudel.digitalcourage.de/9mizSGXFudN7cGCj) for the timing of the next session. 
* **Until the next session:** You mark on a spreadsheet which readings you are interested in. 
* **During the next session (1. Oktober):** We coordinate groups to present the readings and to talk through more concrete project-ideas. 
* **During the hackathon:** Keynotes by [Gregor Betz](https://www.gregorbetz.de/) and [Charles Pence](https://charlespence.net/en/), short reading presentations (10 min presentation + 10 min discussion each), interactive introductions to text-analysis and network-models, and most of all *work, work, work!*
